arts.ttl: Flick lauds Ferran's impact as striker in Barça win
arts.sum: Ferran Torres scored a hat trick in the first half hour to lead Barcelona to a 5-0 victory over Valencia and a spot in the semifinals of the Copa del Rey.

arts.ttl: ‘This is the style we want’ - Flick happy with Barca win
arts.sum: Flick says he’s happy to see his players hungry for goals and creating lots of chances. Flick also praised Ferran for his hat-trick and Pedri who enjoyed another influential performance in midfield for Barca.

arts.ttl: Former Man Utd and Barcelona star sentenced for Rolls-Royce drink driving
arts.sum: The 30-year-old recently joined Brazilian club Corinthians last summer so was not in court in person to hear the sentencing. A court in Monaco has sentenced Memphis Depay after the former Manchester United and Barcelona forward was caught drink driving last August.

arts.ttl: European football: Fiorentina dent Inter title hopes, Barça rout Valencia in cup
arts.sum: Inter beaten 3-0 and miss chance to go top of Serie A Ferran Torres hit hat-trick in 5-0 Copa del Rey victory Internazionale missed their chance to go top of Serie A , the defending champions suffering a 3-0 defeat at Fiorentina as Moise Kean scored twice for the hosts. The defeat left Inter in second place on 51 points, three behind the leaders, Napoli, and Fiorentina moved up to fourth on 42 points, above Lazio on goal difference. The original match on 1 December was suspended when Fiorentina’s Edoardo Bove collapsed on the pitch and was taken to hospital, and the game restarted at 0-0 in the 17th minute with a Fiorentina throw-in. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Barcelona routs Valencia again to reach Copa del Rey semifinals
arts.sum: Ferran Torres scored a hat trick in the first half hour to lead Barcelona to another rout of Valencia and a spot in the semifinals of the Copa del Rey on Thursday. Ander Barrenetxea and Brais Méndez scored first-half goals to give Sociedad the home victory against an Osasuna team that played a man down from the 35th when Alejandro Catena was sent off with a straight red card after video review intervened.

arts.ttl: Valencia 0-5 Barcelona: Player ratings as Torres hat-trick seals Copa del Rey progress
arts.sum: Player ratings from the Copa del Rey quarter-final encounter between Valencia and Barcelona.

arts.ttl: Valencia 0-5 Barcelona: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Ferran Torres hits treble in demolition job at Mestalla
arts.sum: Barcelona book their spot in the semi-finals of the Copa del Rey courtesy of a 5-0 victory over Valencia, with Ferran Torres netting a hat trick against his former club.

arts.ttl: Barcelona star joins Samuel Eto’o in history books during Valencia romp
arts.sum: Barcelona star Ferran Torres on Thursday secured for himself a piece of history. This came owing to his exploits during Barcelona’s meeting with Valencia. Hansi Flick’s troops are of course…

arts.ttl: Valencia fans chant name of Barcelona star during Copa clash

arts.ttl: Barcelona star refuses to celebrate goals vs Valencia
arts.sum: Barcelona star Ferran Torres opted against celebrating, after adding to his goal tally for the campaign against Valencia. Barcelona are of course currently locked in action. Turning attentions back towards…
